name: Reverse HTTPS implant
author: BishopFox
description: A reverse HTTPS implant/listener generation stub

DomainsHTTP.name: Domains
DomainsHTTP.description: HTTP connection strings for the implant to callback

DomainHTTPListener.name: DomainHTTPListener
DomainHTTPListener.description: Limit responses to a specific domain

LetsEncrypt.name: LetsEncrypt
LetsEncrypt.description: Attempt to provision a Let's Encrypt certificate

Website.name: Website
Website.description: Website name (placed in front of listener, takes care of snoopers)

Persist.name: Persist
Persist.description: Make this listener persistent (automatic spawn on server startup)

Format.name: Format
Format.description: File format extension of the implant (exe, shared, shellcode)

ReconnectInterval.name: ReconnectInterval
ReconnectInterval.description: Attempt to reconnect every n second(s)

ObfuscateSymbols.name: ObfuscateSymbols
ObfuscateSymbols.description: Set to to true to skip symbol obfuscation

Canaries.name: Canaries
Canaries.description: Canary DNS domains (make sure you have/will have a DNS listener running) (Comma-separated list)

LimitDomainJoined.name: LimitDomainJoined
LimitDomainJoined.description: Limit execution to domain joined machines
